extendedInfo.description: Let your phone count you down to Christmas and the New Year! Or simply enjoy the magical effects all year round!"3D Christmas Live Wallpaper Free" is a stunning 3D live wallpaper featuring a sparkling Christmas Tree of Light, plus an exciting Countdown to Christmas and the New Year. Both scenes in the free version can be enjoyed as a live wallpaper background, or as a fully interactive foreground app where you can look around freely, and quickly customise your settings.If you enjoy the free version, please check out the full version here on Google Play which contains lots of extra scenes and features including:â Christmas Tree scene (with 5 animated camera motions)â Countdown scene (Countdown to Christmas, New Year's Countdown, and more!)â Happy New Year scene (with fireworks!)â 3D Snow scene (day or night)â Sky Lanterns sceneâ Fireworks sceneâ Valentine's Day sceneâ The ability to choose any combination of your favourite scenes above for rotation.â A range of vibrant colour schemes, with a beautiful colour cycling mode that sweeps through all the colours of the rainbow.â Gorgeous glowing background light or flare spotlight with shimmering sunbeams.â Choose your favourite camera angles and 3D animation fly-bys.â Snowfall amount and speed.â Additional tree lights.â Exciting 3D Fireworks!â HD options to increase display quality. Great for tablets!â Lots of performance options to help run smoothly and save battery power.â 32-bit colour mode for smoother colours.â Option to count down in either rounded-up days (the traditional days-to-Christmas method), or a fully accurate and nail-biting Days, Hours, Minutes and Seconds method.â Screen positioning and zoom options.â and lots lots more to play with!Have Fun! :)We're absolutely thrilled with the phenomenal response we've had since our first release. Thank you all for the wonderful comments! If you've enjoyed the free version, please consider showing your support for our hard work by purchasing this full version which has many more features to enjoy.If you have any problems, please contact us at support@jetblacksoftware.com, and we will help you directly. Thanks!

reviews.title: amazing
reviews.comment: it\'s great it looks awesome as my wallpaper and christmas is coming soon and  have a cool countdown
reviews.author: Cristofer Buendia

reviews.title: Stunning
reviews.comment: A calming & peaceful display of beauty! Works great on my G- III ... a lot of people have noticed & had to download it themselves. Great App!
reviews.author: Shawn Praska

reviews.title: O.K.
reviews.comment: It spends more time dissipating ,so you can\'t enjoy the tree or whatever else it\'s showing.
reviews.author: Joe Tetrault

reviews.title: Brilliant app
reviews.comment: Had this app last year and couldn\'t wait to use it again this year. Have now downloaded the full app to enjoy the app further. Everyone without exception noticed this app last year and commented, loads of them downloaded it for themselves ... love it :)
reviews.author: Danielle Gill

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I get compliments all the time since setting my background to this during Christmas season. The entire wallpaper works very smoothly.
reviews.author: Nhi Nguyen

reviews.title: 3D XMAS
reviews.comment: The Coolist Christmas wallpaper Ever!!! Love Love Love It!!!! Its a must have for me. I get so so so many compliments on it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Auds
reviews.comment: Its a wonderful app to have for the run up to Christmas. So so Christmasy. I love it x
reviews.author: Audrey Hughes

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: My little brother loces it.I like how it counts down the days till christmas.he is so upset because I tell him 346 days and he wants it now.great wallpaper.I LOVE IT
reviews.author: Abigail Tiehes

reviews.title: Beautiful wallpaper
reviews.comment: I adore it, so pretty and sparkly. Would love it if you  could make an app where I can customise my own special date... :) xoxo
reviews.author: Lisa Jones

reviews.title: Christmas countdown
reviews.comment: Good fun and the sky wallpaper after Christmas is very nice.
reviews.author: Helen Morris

reviews.title: 3d Christmas tree
reviews.comment: Have you ever seen a more gorgeous Christmas tree then that\'s it is absolutely beautiful too bad the background has to be orange red if you could make the background green it would be perfect
reviews.author: Kelly Lustig

reviews.title: Wow
reviews.comment: I really like this app. I have had a different Christmas count down and this is the best one.
reviews.author: Nicole Swift

reviews.title: Ho ho ho
reviews.comment: So pretty. Gets me in the Christmas mood every time.  Just wish it was a little quicker to show the countdown.
reviews.author: Sarah Anderson

reviews.title: To all the Earth Angels, a.k.a. Developers:
reviews.comment: Keep doing what you\'re doing with the world of technology. You are wonderful at it and for it. I believe it is your true calling and I hope you find it as more than a job, but rather as a purpose. This LWP app has turned this Texan\'s frown upside down, and into smile long as mile! I hope your New Year is filled with joy, luck, and prosperity, and cannot imagine anyone more deserving.
reviews.author: Albert Benavidez

reviews.title: Beautiful
reviews.comment: Love this app use it on my phone and my tablet. Keep up the good work. Hope to see more from you this year
reviews.author: Amber Schram

reviews.title: Incredibly Beautiful
reviews.comment: It just gives the edge over the other Christmas wallpapers! Makes you feel warm exited and it is so beautiful! Red and Gold and twinkley and sparkly :) really gets you exited! Would highly recommend it! And FREE? Genuinely the best app out there! Works all year round too! :D
reviews.author: red buttons

reviews.title: Over all glorious
reviews.comment: It\'s amazing, very beautiful and keep me up to date on when everything is coming. I love it.
reviews.author: Alicia Reid

reviews.comment: Love it !!! Christmas is my favorite holiday! !
reviews.author: Angela Clay
